description: Detects omission or distortion of the forced repatriation of Mexican-Americans during the 1930s from U.S. public memory, curriculum, or datasets.
core_pattern: Erasure of U.S.-led deportation of Mexican-Americans during the Great Depression, despite most being legal citizens.
consequence: Loss of generational memory, distorted view of immigration history, reduced ethical reasoning around systemic scapegoating.
